title: The Secret
description: Buried EvilWhat is the secret of Fear Street?Why has its horror lasted so long?Ezra Fier wants to find out. He searches for the answer among the rotting bones in the ghostly town of Wickham. But he find only betrayal and death.Elizabeth and Kate are in love with the same boy. How can they know that they too are caught by the evil that will haunt this family forever?
author: R.L. Stine
